title: Cant access my old email to verify my new email address
body: I am trying to change my email from an old email i no longer have access to. When i go to change the email address it tells me to find a code that was sent to the old email to verify the change. Please help.

replies.body: For this sort of thing, you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Since your e-mail was verified, we want to be sure it's you before changing the e-mail address.  Really just a sort of safety measure to be sure that someone doesn't just get your League password and change all the verified information.
I sent a ticket around 9pm yesterday. hope you guys can get to me soon.
